code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import authReducer from"../reducers/authReducer";import itemReducer from"../reducers/itemReducer";var middlewares=[thunk];if(process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'){var _require=require('redux-logger'),logger=_require.logger;middlewares.push(logger);}var store=createStore(combineReducers({auth:authReducer,item:itemReducer}),applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares));export default store;
